about_the_game:
Dominate the neon-soaked streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler, a fusion of classic cyberpunk anime aesthetics and retro road combat gameplay. Enter a futuristic underworld where rival gangs battle for supremacy, and every mile on the highway is a fight for survival.

Choose your character, and dive into the chaos of high-speed combat racing. Tear through the streets of Neo Tokyo, where every twist and turn on the road is a fight for dominance. Use whatever you can to take down opponents and stay ahead of the pack.

  • Race against time and against other bikers while avoiding the night city traffic.

  • Take down your opponents by any means, but be aware as they will try to do the same!

  • Test your reflexes in a mesh of racing and fighting on the streets.

  • Inspired by the aesthetic of cult classics cyperpunk anime.

This is no ordinary race—it's a ruthless battle for survival where only the fastest and fiercest riders can claim glory. Prepare for non-stop action as you dodge and outmaneuver rivals, and prove you have what it takes to rule the highways.

Will you rise to the challenge and claim your place as a legend in the streets of Neo Tokyo, or will you crash and burn like so many before you? The road is yours—if you’re brave enough to take it.

Dominate the neon-soaked streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler, a fusion of classic cyberpunk anime aesthetics and retro road combat gameplay. Enter a futuristic underworld where rival gangs battle for supremacy, and every mile on the highway is a fight for survival.

Choose your character, and dive into the chaos of high-speed combat racing. Tear through the streets of Neo Tokyo, where every twist and turn on the road is a fight for dominance. Use whatever you can to take down opponents and stay ahead of the pack.

  • Race against time and against other bikers while avoiding the night city traffic.

  • Take down your opponents by any means, but be aware as they will try to do the same!

  • Test your reflexes in a mesh of racing and fighting on the streets.

  • Inspired by the aesthetic of cult classics cyperpunk anime.

This is no ordinary race—it's a ruthless battle for survival where only the fastest and fiercest riders can claim glory. Prepare for non-stop action as you dodge and outmaneuver rivals, and prove you have what it takes to rule the highways.

Will you rise to the challenge and claim your place as a legend in the streets of Neo Tokyo, or will you crash and burn like so many before you? The road is yours—if you’re brave enough to take it.

movies.name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo Reveal Trailer

name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB VRAM) / AMD RX 580 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 Super (8 GB VRAM) / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Dominate the streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler. Inspired by classic cyberpunk anime and retro road combat games, fight rival gangs and claim the neon-lit highways as your own.
